item.title: Freeholder should be held reponsible for locking bins, 25th August
item.description:
Trash all over the place as usual in this spot. Now freeholder must be held responsible for not leaving the bins outsider their locker unattended during the week. The bins encourage flytippers. Cameras should also be placed. Council must act and hold freeholder responsible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barforth Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Only part road marking is clear, 25th August
item.description:

item.title: Possible extension of double yellow lines?, 25th August
item.description:
At the corner junction of Poverest Road and Churchill Road facing down Churchill Road , may I suggest extending the double lines by approx. five metres to help the R3 drivers due to a tight corner when vehicles are parked tight against the start/end of double lines, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 207, Poverest Road, Poverest, London
